title: The Wicked Wit of William Shakespeare
description: The Wicked Wit of William Shakespeare is a collection of quotations from one of the finest wits known to literary history, embracing not just wit and comedy, the ironic perceptions of his characters, but also great tragic speeches whose wit lies in the genius of their language. With a detailed introduction to Shakespeare's life and work, as well as notes on entries, this beautifully produced book is a must for all lovers of this greatest of all literary giants.
author: William Shakespeare
